Package validator

Class InputValidator

java.lang.Object
validator.InputValidator
public class InputValidator
extends java.lang.Object
class contains methods to validate the inputs of the app

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor Description
    InputValidator()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void validateCredentials​(java.lang.String s1, java.lang.String s2)
    method used to validate the existence of a username and a password in the login interface text fields
    java.lang.Double validateDouble​(java.lang.String s)
    method to check if the input is double
    int validateInt​(java.lang.String s)
    method to check if the input is integer
    MenuItem validateMenuItem​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String rating, java.lang.String calories, java.lang.String proteins, java.lang.String fat, java.lang.String sodium, java.lang.String price)
    method to validate the fields of a new MenuItem
    int validateSearch​(java.lang.String s)
    method used for preparing the fields of a new MenuItem to search for in the menu if the string is blank it means that the user does not need a specific values for that entry also, throws exception if the parameter is not an integer
    java.lang.Double validateSearchD​(java.lang.String s)
    method used for preparing the fields of a new MenuItem to search for in the menu if the string is blank it means that the user does not need a specific values for that entry also, throws exception if the parameter is not a double
    java.lang.String validateSearchS​(java.lang.String s)
    method used for preparing the fields of a new MenuItem to search for in the menu if the string is blank it means that the user does not need a specific values for that entry also, throws exception if the parameter is not a double

  • Method Details

    • validateCredentials

      public void validateCredentials​(java.lang.String s1, java.lang.String s2)
      method used to validate the existence of a username and a password in the login interface text fields
      Parameters:
      s1 - username
      s2 - password

    • validateInt

      public int validateInt​(java.lang.String s)
      method to check if the input is integer
      Parameters:
      s - the string which needs to be checked if it contains an integer
      Returns:
      the parsed string

    • validateDouble

      public java.lang.Double validateDouble​(java.lang.String s)
      method to check if the input is double
      Parameters:
      s - the string which needs to be checked if it contains a double value
      Returns:
      the parsed string

    • validateMenuItem

      public MenuItem validateMenuItem​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String rating, java.lang.String calories, java.lang.String proteins, java.lang.String fat, java.lang.String sodium, java.lang.String price)
      method to validate the fields of a new MenuItem
      Parameters:
      name - field name of MenuItem
      rating - field rating of MenuItem
      calories - field calories of MenuItem
      proteins - field proteins of MenuItem
      fat - field fat of MenuItems
      sodium - field sodium of MenuItem
      price - field price of MenuItem
      Returns:
      the new MenuItem object

    • validateSearch

      public int validateSearch​(java.lang.String s)
      method used for preparing the fields of a new MenuItem to search for in the menu if the string is blank it means that the user does not need a specific values for that entry also, throws exception if the parameter is not an integer
      Parameters:
      s - string to check for properties
      Returns:
      the parsed string or -1

    • validateSearchS

      public java.lang.String validateSearchS​(java.lang.String s)
      method used for preparing the fields of a new MenuItem to search for in the menu if the string is blank it means that the user does not need a specific values for that entry also, throws exception if the parameter is not a double
      Parameters:
      s - string to check for properties
      Returns:
      the string or "###"

    • validateSearchD

      public java.lang.Double validateSearchD​(java.lang.String s)
      method used for preparing the fields of a new MenuItem to search for in the menu if the string is blank it means that the user does not need a specific values for that entry also, throws exception if the parameter is not a double
      Parameters:
      s - string to check for properties
      Returns:
      the parsed string or -1
